Item.name: Ambu bag
Item.description: A bag valve mask (BVM), is a hand-held device commonly used to provide positive pressure ventilation to patients who are not breathing or not breathing adequately

Item.name: Stasis Bag
Item.description: Stops biological processes and protects against cerebral hypoxia

Item.name: Auto-Compression
Item.description: An automated, portable, battery-powered cardiopulmonary resuscitation
